meanings.definition: desecrators: those who violate or treat with disrespect something considered sacred or holy.
meanings.sent1: The desecrators entered the church and vandalized the altar.
meanings.sent2: The desecrators were caught defacing the ancient tomb.
meanings.sent3: The desecrators thought it would be funny to draw on the sacred tree.
meanings.sent4: Their actions turned them into desecrators of tradition and faith.
meanings.sent5: The desecrators left a trail of destruction in the sacred grounds.
